messages.subject: Nagamkai training for women in Edo period?
messages.msgSnippet: I remember reading in Turnbull s Samurai s Sourcbook that samurai women were expected to learn the use of nagamaki. Is this also true to Edo-period women or
messages.messageBody:
I remember reading in Turnbull's Samurai's Sourcbook that samurai
women were expected to learn the use of nagamaki. Is this also true to
Edo-period women or only prior to that, during the waring-states (or
even earlier)?
Thank you!
